contents.name: det_box_x
contents.description: Bounding box x-axis for detected human.

contents.name: det_box_y
contents.description: Bounding box y-axis for detected human.

contents.name: det_box_width
contents.description: Bounding box width for detected human.

contents.name: det_box_height
contents.description: Bounding box height for detected human.

contents.name: audio
contents.description: Stereo digital, PDM Microphone MEMS (Silicon) omnidirectional (-26dB +-1dB @ 94dB SPL) solder pads.

contents.name: accelerometers
contents.description: 3D digital linear acceleration sensor has a linear acceleration full scale of +-2g,+-4g,+-8,+-16 g.

contents.name: gyro
contents.description: 3D digital angular rate sensor has an angular rate of +-245,+-500,+-2000 dps.

contents.name: magnetometer
contents.description: 3D digital magnetic sensor has a magnetic field full scale of +-4,+-8,+-12,+-16 gauss.
